ðŸ“– Summary: Ghost Framework is an Android post-exploitation framework that leverages the Android Debug Bridge (ADB) to enable remote access and control of Android devices. It provides a platform for executing post-exploitation tasks on compromised or targeted Android systems. The framework facilitates various hacking and penetration testing activities.
